item.title: Braum’s withdraws zoning request – what next?
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Braum’s Ice Cream and Dairy Stores withdrew a zoning request Friday that, if passed, would have resulted in demolishing the buildings that house Hi-Lo Club, Drunken Fry and Classen Grill. This comes after Braum’s lost before the Oklahoma City Planning Commission to get several small parcels in the triangle of land rezoned from residential to […]

The post Braum’s withdraws zoning request – what next? appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Braums loses bid before OKC Planning Commission
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
It just wasn’t Braum’s day in the Oklahoma City Planning Commission Thursday. Braum’s wants to buy and demolish the Classen Grill building and the Donnay building that holds the popular Drunken Fry and Hi-Lo Club. They have contingency contracts to buy both. But they won’t unless they get some small empty lots rezoned from their […]

The post Braums loses bid before OKC Planning Commission appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Angry neighbors meet Braums reps
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Angry neighbors and fans of businesses in the Donnay and Classen Grill buildings near the intersection of Classen Boulevard and NW Expressway met with Braums representatives Monday night. After several hours it was no clearer than at the start whether the neighbors would have any sway in the process of Braums taking over the site […]

The post Angry neighbors meet Braums reps appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.
